name: Warrior Gorget
description: Medieval warrior Larp gorget is the perfect neck guard used as part of your larp costume or to attach your pauldrons to. Solid leather buckles and straps fix the parts together and you can use the loops on either side to affix your Larp shoulder pads.

name: Dark Drake Gorget
description: The Dark Drake Larp gorget has a beautiful raised web pattern that will add a touch of class to your Larp character. Whether you are a dark knight or just a simple Larp warrior, you can use this medieval gorget to enhance your costume or to attach your Larp pauldrons to.

name: Bevor Gorget
description: The medieval polished Gothic Bevor gorget has an articulated chin and neck and is the perfect protection against assassins and is awesome for any Larp warrior. This larp gorget allows the wearer protection against any frontal attack, such as spears and lances, while minimally restricting movement and vision during battle.

name: Bevor Gorget, Dark
description: The Dark Bevor gorget is a perfect way to protect your neck and chin from frontal attacks or assassination attempts during a Larp event. This mild steel gorget has an articulated chin which can be lowered so the dark knight can consume his food or beverage or to speak to his companions.

name: Warrior Gorget, Dark
description: This awesome Dark Warrior gorget is the perfect Larp armor accessory to attach your Larp pauldrons to. Made from mild steel, this fantasy gorget will embellish your Larp costume with class, protecting your neck from would be assassins.

name: King Gorget
description: The King Larp gorget is made from mild steel with a polished finish with a raised pattern and acid grey finish. The gorget is a great Larp armor accessory that can be used alone or used to tie your Larp pauldrons to. Great for any Larper, this medieval style gorget ads beauty and class to any costume.
